item.title: Installing Robo3t in Ubuntu 18.X
item.description: download robomongo 3t from their website. Let downloaded file name is robomongo-0.9.0-rc8-linux-x86_64-c113244.tar.gz extract robomongo-0.9.0-rc8-linux-x86_64-c113244.tar.gz file move extracted folder to /usr/bin directory by following command sudo mv robomongo-0.9.0-rc8-linux-x86_64-c113244/ /usr/bin/robomongo add export PATH=/usr/bin/robomongo/bin:$PATH in your .bashrc or .zshrc If you are using fish shell, you need to change the last line to: set PATH $PATH /usr/bin/robomongo/bin now start robo3t by typing following in command prompt robo3t
